title: Closet Shelf Stability Kit
summary: Reduce wobble on wire closet shelves with braces and shelf liners that spread weight.

fitCheck.question: Do your wire shelves sag in the middle?
Can you use small screws with landlord approval?
Are you storing heavier items like bins?

kit.name: Wire shelf support brackets
kit.why: Adds mid-span support to reduce sag.

kit.name: Closet shelf liner
kit.why: Spreads weight and keeps items flat.

steps: Mark the center of the shelf span on the wall.
Install the support bracket with anchors and screws.
Clip the shelf into the bracket for extra support.
Lay the shelf liner to prevent items from tipping.
mistakes: Skipping anchors can cause the bracket to loosen.
Overloading the shelf beyond its rating risks failure.
